definition: to peel with a knife/to pare/to cut (a ball at tennis etc)
person suffering exploitation/the workers in Marxist theory

sentences.english: Chinese culture sees all non-Chinese as sub-human, to be exploited.
sentences.chinese: 中国文化把所有的其他人种视为有待剥削的次等民族。

sentences.english: We have abolished the system of exploitation of man by man.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经彻底废除了人剥削人的制度。

sentences.english: Why orb spiders are successful receiver exploiters ?
sentences.chinese: 为何结网性蜘蛛为成功的受讯方剥削者？

sentences.english: The exploiting class lusts for riches.
These are the poor. These are the beaten.
History, outbreaks of several anti-exploitation of the peasant uprising against oppression.
sentences.chinese: 历史上曾暴发过多次反剥削反压迫的农民起义。

sentences.english: In experimental settings, people were subjected to free-riders who exploited them.
sentences.chinese: 在一项研究中里，人们屈从于搭便车者的剥削。

sentences.english: It is the exploitation of the ordinary people which has become the pernicious prerogative of the ruling elite.
sentences.chinese: 对普通大众的剥削形成了统治阶层有害的特权。

sentences.english: Others say that there’s a fine line between the pageants and sexual exploitation.
sentences.chinese: 其他人说，选美和性剥削之间只有非常细微的界线。

sentences.english: They really fleeced us at that restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 那家餐厅收费太高了，简直是剥削。

sentences.english: He always sided with the oppressed and the exploited.
sentences.chinese: 他总是站在被压迫和被剥削者一边。

sentences.english: State-imposed exploitation accounts for 20 percent of the world total of forced labor.
sentences.chinese: 国家强制型剥削占全球强制劳工总数的20%。

sentences.english: According to Marxist thought being of the property-owning class and exploitive of the working class .
sentences.chinese: 属于拥有财产的阶级而且剥削工人阶级。

sentences.english: The Musahars are landless, have no regular jobs, and very much exploited.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有土地，没有固定工作，受到严重的剥削。

sentences.english: Capital appropriates the surplus value, a process referred to as exploitation of labor.
sentences.chinese: 私有资本攫取剩余价值，即对劳动的剥削过程。

sentences.english: It is dependent on exploiting the surplus-value of prolateriat.
sentences.chinese: 这跟剥削剩余价值有关。

definition: to press/to squeeze/to extract juice, oil etc by squeezing
to tax by force and extort levies (idiom); to screw taxes out of the people by force
